english.segment1: God and God alone. Created all these things we call our own. From the mighty to the small. The glory in them all. Is God's and God's alone
english.segment2: God and God alone. Reveals the truth of all we call unknown. All the best and worst of man. Can't change the master plan. It's God's and God's alone
english.segment3: God and God alone. Is fit to take the universe's throne. Let everything that lives. Reserve its truest praise. For God and God alone
english.segment4: God and God alone. Will be the joy of our eternal home. He will be our one desire. Our hearts will never tire. Of God and God alone
english.segment5: Words and Music by Phill McHugh. Copyright 1984 River Oaks Music Co. (BMI). This arrangement copyright 1986 River Oaks Music Co. All rights admin.
